name: Dog Nail Grinder with 2 LED Lights Powerful 2 Speeds Super Quiet Dog Nail Trimmers with 3 Grinding Wheels Rechargeable Pet Dog Nail Clippers for Large Medium Puppy Dogs Dog Nail File Cat Nail Clipper
short_description: 【Enhanced Professional Dog Nail Clippers Kit】Elevate pet nail care with our high-quality LOPSIC dog nail grinder kit.This UPGRADED kit includes essential accessories designed to provide optimal nail care. 【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Operating LOPSIC dog nail grinder only produces less than 40dB of noise, which benefits from its superior mute engine and motor. The dog nail trimmers’ ergonomic body design minimizes vibration and noise, so pets won’t feel scared or frightened while having their nails trimmed. Designed with your pet’s comfort in mind, it’s safe for pets to enjoy nail grooming at home with LOPSIC dog nail clippers，it is the best choice for small medium and large animal nail care

When using the dog nail trimmers at the proper speed, pet nails of different hardness can be efficiently ground

【3 Grinding Ports & Rechargeable】: LOPSIC dog nail grinder has 3 grinding ports for grinding different sized pets’ nails, suitable for all types of large,medium, small animal nail care and cat claw care. You can select an appropriate port to trim nails of different thicknesses and lengths. The dog nail trimmers are specially designed rechargeable devices, making it convenient to charge and use this dog nail grinder for dogs anytime and anywhere

【Portable & Beginner-Friendly Design】: To make dog nail clippers easy to carry and operate for pet parents, the upgraded LOPSIC dog nail clipper is lightweight and ergonomic. The cordless dog nail grinder gives more flexibility and is fit for both beginners and professionals. By following the user manual of cat nail clipper, anyone can trim their pet’s nails safely and effectively.【A 2-year limited warranty is included. Please contact us if you have any problems.】

name: Casfuy New 6-Speed Dog Nail Grinder - 50% More Power Dog Nail Trimmers with 2 LED Lights Quiet 7h Running Time Electric Pet Nail Grinder File Toenail Grinder for Large Medium Small Dogs & Cats (DB)
short_description: 【6 Precisely Controlled Speeds - Match Your Dog’s Nail Needs】 The Casfuy N75 dog nail grinder features 6 speeds from 7,000 to 12,000 RPM, offering precise and safe nail grinding. Begin at a low speed to help your dog adjust, then increase to the ideal speed for your pet’s nail hardness and sensitivity. With its wide speed range, you can always find the perfect speed for your dog.

【Upgraded Pure Copper Motor – 50% More Power, 10% Less Noise】Tired of weak, noisy grinders? Our new pet nail grinder is equipped with an upgraded pure copper motor that delivers 50% more power with 10% less noise (about 40dB). Powerful enough for the toughest nails, yet gentle enough to keep your pet calm—experience the perfect balance of strength and quiet.

【2 LED Lights — Illuminate the Quick for Safe Grinding】 Over-clipping can be frustrating and painful for pets. The dog nail grinder features two built-in LED lights illuminating the quick clearly, making it easy to see and avoid over-clipping.

【Diamond Bit with 2 Caps – Fits All Dogs, Dust-Free Grooming】 The high-hardness diamond bit delivers sharp, efficient, and long-lasting performance. Choose from two interchangeable protective caps or use the open grinding option to suit small, medium, or large dogs. The upgraded dust cap captures up to 95% of nail debris, keeping your grooming area cleaner and mess-free.

【Long-Lasting Battery – Nonstop Grinding Efficiency】 With up to 7 hours of runtime, the 2000mAh battery lasts three times longer than typical grinders, letting you groom multiple pets hassle-free. Three LED indicators keep you informed of battery life at a glance. No interruptions—just smooth, reliable grooming.

name: Upgraded Slient Dog Nail Grinder, Professional Pet Nail Grinder, Triple Speed Settings, 2000mAh Battery, Ultra Quiet Operation for Stress-Free Grooming for Small Medium Large Dogs & Cat
short_description: DUAL LED ILLUMINATION FOR SAFE PRECISION GROOMING: The Dog Nail Grinder features advanced dual LED lights that clearly illuminate your pet's nail quick, dramatically reducing the risk of accidental cuts and injuries. This innovative lighting system is especially beneficial for grooming in low-light environments, ensuring you can see exactly where to trim safely. The precision illumination makes this Nail Trimmer ideal for both experienced groomers and pet parents who want professional-level safety at home.

PROFESSIONAL TRIPLE SPEED CONTROL SYSTEM: Experience ultimate control with three customizable speed settings: Low (7000 RPM), Medium (8000 RPM), and High (9000 RPM) to accommodate pets of all sizes and nail thickness. The Pet Nail Trimmer for Dogs allows you to tailor the grinding intensity based on your pet's sensitivity level and nail hardness for optimal comfort. This professional-grade speed control ensures efficient grooming while maintaining your pet's comfort throughout the entire nail trimming process.

POWERFUL 2000MAH LONG-LASTING BATTERY: The Dog Nail Grinder Cordless is equipped with an upgraded 2000mAh high-capacity battery, delivering 2.5x more power than previous 800mAh models. Enjoy extended cordless operation that easily handles multiple pets in one grooming session without interruption. The superior battery life means you can groom freely without being tethered to power outlets, making it perfect for mobile grooming or outdoor use.

ULTRA-QUIET OPERATION UNDER 40DB: The Dog Nail Trimmer operates at whisper-quiet levels below 40 decibels with minimal vibration, significantly reducing pet stress and anxiety during grooming sessions. This ultra-quiet design helps build trust between you and your pet, making nail trimming a more pleasant experience for nervous or sensitive animals. The low-noise operation allows for calm, stress-free grooming that won't startle or frighten your beloved companion.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN WITH MULTIPLE GRINDING PORTS: Featuring a lightweight, portable design with ergonomic grip for comfortable extended use during grooming sessions. The Nail Trimmer includes multiple grinding port attachments to safely and efficiently handle different nail sizes and hardness levels across various pet breeds. This versatile design promotes healthy claw maintenance by preventing overgrowth while ensuring a comfortable grooming experience for both pet and owner.

A NOTE FOR SENSITIVE PETS: Is your pet nervous? It's completely normal for some pets to be wary of new sounds or vibrations. Don't be discouraged! We recommend a simple desensitization process: (1) Familiarize: Let your pet sniff the grinder while it's OFF. Reward with treats. (2) Sound: Turn it on near your pet (not on them) and offer praise/treats to build a positive association. (3) Brief Contact: Once calm, briefly touch the grinder to one nail for 1-2 seconds, then immediately reward. (4) Gradual Increase: Keep sessions short and positive, slowly increasing time as comfort grows. Patience is key!
